@/lib/errorReporter.notes: errorReporter.report() accepts only: message, stack, componentStack, url, userAgent, timestamp. Never pass errorBoundary, source, error, errorBoundaryProps, or level.

zustand.notes: Named imports only. Use: import { create } from 'zustand'. No default export.

@tanstack/react-query.notes: v5 API: useQuery({ queryKey, queryFn }). When using useQuery, ensure main.tsx wraps the app with <QueryClientProvider client={queryClient}>.

lucide-react.notes: All icons named. Airplane→Plane, Template→FileText, Fire→Flame, Barbell→Dumbbell.

zod.notes: Import { z }. Use z.object(). NEVER import Filter.

@radix-ui/react-slider.notes: Only import { Slider }. Never SliderTrack, SliderRange, SliderThumb.

react-flow.notes: Named exports only. No default import.

uuid.notes: Use { v4 } from 'uuid' for IDs. Not nanoid.
